pages.text: 16|15|aur usane dharatee mein parvat gaad diye, taaki tumhen lekar dolane na lage tatha nadiyaan aur raahen, taaki tum raah pao.
16|16|tatha bahut-se chinh (bana diye) aur ve sitaaron se (bhee) raah[1] paate hain.
16|17|to kya, jo utpatti karata hai, usake samaan hai, jo utpatti nahin karata? kya tum shiksha grahan nahin karate
16|18|aur yadi tum allaah ke puraskaaron kee ganana karana chaaho, to kabhee nahin kar sakate. vaastav mein, allaah bada kshama tatha daya karane vaala hai.
16|19|tatha allaah jaanata hai, jo tum chhupaate ho aur jo tum vyakt karate ho.
16|20|aur jinhen ve allaah ke siva pukaarate hain, ve kisee cheez kee utpatti nahin kar sakate. jabaki ve svayan utpann kiye jaate hain.
16|21|ve nirjeev praanaheen hain aur (ye bhee) nahin jaanate ki kab punah jeevit kiye jaayenge.
16|22|tumhaara poojy bas ek hai, phir jo log paralok par eemaan nahin laate, unake dil nivartee (virodhee) hain aur ve abhimaanee hain.
16|23|jo kuchh ve chhupaate tatha vyakt karate hain, nishchay allaah use jaanata hai. vaastav mein, vah abhimaaniyon se prem nahin karata.
16|24|aur jab unase poochha jaaye ki tumhaare paalanahaar ne kya utaara hai[1]? to kahate hain ki poorvajon kee kalpit kathaen hain.
16|25|taaki ve apane (paapon ka) poora bojh pralay ke din uthaayen tatha kuchh un logon ka bojh (bhee), jinhen bina gyaan ke kupath kar rahe the, saavadhaan! ve kitana bura bojh uthaayenge

16|26|inase pahale ke log bhee shadyantr rachate rahe, to allaah ne unake shadyantr ke bhavan ka unamoolan kar diya, phir oopar se unapar chhat gir padee aur unapar aisee disha se yaatana aa gaee, jise ve soch bhee nahin rahe the.
